text: The average length of pregnancy is 40 weeks. And Kylie Jenner said that she and Travis Scott welcomed their baby girl into the world 41 weeks after their first date. The 20 - year - old make - up mogul made the shocking revelation in her cover story with GQ magazine that she began hanging out with the 26 - year - old rapper an average gestational period before welcoming their daughter Stormi.
